\w Howl|strong="H3213"\w*, O Hesebon, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* Hai \w is|strong="H4428"\w* wasted. \w Cry|strong="H6817"\w*, ye \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Rabbath, \w gird|strong="H2296"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H2296"\w* \w with|strong="H2296"\w* haircloth: \w mourn|strong="H5594"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* go \w about|strong="H4428"\w* \w by|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* hedges: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* Melchom \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H4428"\w* carried \w into|strong="H1323"\w* captivity, \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*.

\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* gloriest thou \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w valleys|strong="H6010"\w*? thy \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* hath \w flowed|strong="H2100"\w* \w away|strong="H2100"\w*, \w O|strong="H4310"\w* delicate \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \w that|strong="H4310"\w* hast \w trusted|strong="H0982"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* thy \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* hast \w said|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w shall|strong="H4310"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*?

Against \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*.
